scripts.start: multi-file-swagger multifile.yaml > api/swagger/swagger.json && json2yaml ./api/swagger/swagger.json > ./api/swagger/swagger.yaml && node api/server/server.js
scripts.startdev: multi-file-swagger multifile.yaml > api/swagger/swagger.json && json2yaml ./api/swagger/swagger.json > ./api/swagger/swagger.yaml && swagger validate ./api/swagger/swagger.yaml && nodemon --watch ./api --ignore 'api/swagger/swagger*.*' -e js,yaml,json,yml api/server/server.js
scripts.debugdev: multi-file-swagger multifile.yaml > api/swagger/swagger.json && json2yaml ./api/swagger/swagger.json > ./api/swagger/swagger.yaml && swagger validate ./api/swagger/swagger.yaml && nodemon --inspect=0.0.0.0:5555 --watch ./api --ignore 'api/swagger/swagger*.*' -e js,yaml,json,yml api/server/server.js
scripts.swaggerdev: multi-file-swagger multifile-remote.yaml > api/swagger/swagger-remote.json && json2yaml ./api/swagger/swagger-remote.json > ./api/swagger/swagger-remote.yaml && swagger validate ./api/swagger/swagger.yaml && nodemon --watch ./api --ignore 'api/swagger/swagger*.*' -e js,yaml,json,yml app-editor.js
scripts.swagger-editor: multi-file-swagger multifile-remote.yaml > api/swagger/swagger-remote.json && json2yaml ./api/swagger/swagger-remote.json > ./api/swagger/swagger-remote.yaml && node app-editor.js
scripts.test: multi-file-swagger multifile.yaml > api/swagger/swagger.json && json2yaml ./api/swagger/swagger.json > ./api/swagger/swagger.yaml && swagger validate ./api/swagger/swagger.yaml && swagger project test
